comment.author: 80456351@N00
comment._content: I really wonder how life was in this birdcage.

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: The book/journal/box in her hand has caught my attention.  Is it one of those that Victorian ladies used to write their secrets in?  Looks expensive in any case!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 54708393@N08
comment._content: I think its a photo album .

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] It does! Wondering if it held Cartes de Visite or maybe it was a journal, as you suggest?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Carte's de Visite would be a lot smaller than that and did ladies present them?  Most ladies kept a journal and it was usually lockable so that they could keep their secrets to themselves.  It might be a photo album as Philip suggests but I suspect that they were much larger and as rare as hens teeth in those days?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Absolutely take your point about the rareness of hens' teeth except that the Dillon Family at Clonbrock were keen early amateur photographers. (Thankfully for us or we wouldn't have any of these photos!)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 54708393@N08
comment._content: The glass negs. in this case are 8x10.5cm/3"x5" and would have been contact printed same size.So photo albums would be relativity  small alltough quite expensive.

comment.author: 30687643@N00
comment._content: www.census.nationalarchives.ie/reels/nai001230312/ Augusta living at Mt Congreve , Co. Waterford in the 1901 census age 66

comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: Great image, and wonderful to have such an accurate date. My instinct would have put this a few years earlier, but I wonder if fashions in Ireland were different to those in England?
